body_html:
Hi

I've just reproduced @cielavenir solution.
In my case, I only had to use the ICU flags: #define U_STATIC_IMPLEMENTATION and "-DU_STATIC_IMPLEMENTATION" to get it working. No further changes were needed!

Thanks for sharing your patch!

My setup:
Tensorflow r1.12
Visual Studio 2015
Bazel 0.18.1

body:
Hi

I've just reproduced @cielavenir solution.
In my case, I only had to use the ICU flags: `#define U_STATIC_IMPLEMENTATION` and `"-DU_STATIC_IMPLEMENTATION"` to get it working. **No further changes were needed!**

Thanks for sharing your patch!

My setup:
Tensorflow r1.12
Visual Studio 2015
Bazel 0.18.1
